The Atheist Experience is a call-in show on Austin's public access TV. It airs on Sundays 22:30-23:30 UTC and is sponsored by the Atheist Community of Austin. Live stream at that time:   <a href="
http://www.ustream.tv/channel/the-atheist-experience" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.ustream.tv/channel/the-atheist-experience</a> 

Find more information and other recordings on TAE's website:   <a href="
http://www.atheist-experience.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.atheist-experience.com/</a>

The content of The Atheist Experience, including video and audio downloads and DVDs may be freely copied subject to the Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 3.0 license. The license enables free use of The Atheist Experience content for those not attempting to profit from the work. Please credit the Atheist Community of Austin as the producer of the work when you use it.

Unfortunately, recordings are deleted from the website after a few months, so please keep this torrent seeded. Also, cross-seeding previous torrents of single shows would be awful nice.
